articles.headline: Hawks roll to 127-112 victory over the Magic
articles.description: — Zaccharie Risacher scored 21 points, Nickeil Alexander-Walker had 20 and the Atlanta Hawks beat the Orlando Magic 127-112 on Tuesday night.

images.alt: Hawks roll to 127-112 victory over the Magic

articles.headline: Orlando Magic vs. Atlanta Hawks: Game Highlights
articles.description: Orlando Magic vs. Atlanta Hawks: Game Highlights

images.alt: Orlando Magic vs. Atlanta Hawks: Game Highlights

articles.headline: Dyson Daniels powers Atlanta with 18-6-6 in big win
articles.description: Dyson Daniels showcases his skills, contributing 18 points, 6 rebounds, and 6 assists in a dominant 15-point Hawks victory.

images.alt: Dyson Daniels powers Atlanta with 18-6-6 in big win
